name: 'Titanic' Cassette
description: A music cassette found in a submerged car. The cover shows a ship and two lovers. The music is an echo of a world that believed itself unsinkable.

name: DogBuster Drone
description: A small colorful toy drone. A sticker reads 'DogBuster'. It is broken, but the components could be useful.

name: Advanced Tool Kit
description: A set of high-quality tools, well maintained. Includes precision screwdrivers, wrenches, and measuring instruments. Indispensable for complex repairs.

name: Tech Components
description: Circuits, chips, and wires recovered from advanced equipment. Valuable for those who know how to use them.

name: Vintage Film Reel
description: An 8mm film reel. Contains images of daily life pre-apocalypse. An invaluable historical document.

name: 'Haistulf' Vinyl
description: A vinyl record titled 'Play Rock To The Moon'. The music is powerful and spatial.

name: Energy Drink
description: A can of energy drink full of sugar and caffeine. The taste is chemical, but it wakes you up.

name: Electronic Parts
description: Generic electronic components. Useful for crafting.
